A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If this were a stand alone movie\, my only criticism would be that they were pulling too many strings at one time.  The story was a bit choppy in the telling as a result.  However\, this was movie 8 of a series\, and as such\, I thought it was very disappointing.  The director decided he would just reinvent some characters with little to no thought as to who they had been and what their motivations had been\, previously.
